explanation: [0-0] On a soccer field, a player in a white jersey stands with a soccer ball at his feet, while several opponents in blue jerseys watch him from behind. The watermark "LFEV" appears in white.

[0-3] The man then takes a shot and falls to the ground due to the sudden stop. The white caption "Skriniar" appears on the screen. The ball flies past several blue players towards the goal. A blue player jumps up and pushes the ball upwards, while a teammate behind him sprints into the goal and heads the ball out.
